General.Name: Beijing Strong Biotechnologies Inc
General.Description: Beijing Strong Biotechnologies, Inc. offers in-vitro diagnostics products and services in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company provides clinical biochemistry products, such as reagents and automatic biochemistry analyzers; coagulation products, including reagents and automated coagulation analyzers; pathology and liquid buiopsy and serology products comprising blood type test cards and automated blood grouping analyzers. In addition, it engages in the rental of healthcare instruments; and offers inspection services. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Beijing, the People's Republic of China.

6.Name: Mr. Jian Min  Wang
6.Title: Sec. of the Board of Directors
